attributes.action: ABOLISH THE OUTDATED AND DRACONIAN TV LICENSE THE BBC DOES NOT REPRESENT THE MAJORITY OF BRITAIN
attributes.additional_details: I  would like the Government to debate the abolition of The TV License, the BBC does not deserve to hold carte blanche their world order views at the expense of the License payer they do not have the right to enforce their totally biased views on any matter they are supposed to be IMPARTIAL they are not
